Reviews.Title: “Clean and tidy”
Reviews.Author: Mrs_Marinova
Reviews.Content: husband spent 4 nights middle february 2012 clean tidy hotel near termini station 20 walk breakfast china town service extremely unfriendly unhelpful staf rude time dissapointment nevertheless doesnt mind service hotel worth money

Reviews.Title: “Nice location and rooms”
Reviews.Author: helenamcd
Reviews.Content: location close termini station clean cute bathroom breakfast satisfactory downside doesnt wifi computer available moment checkin informed charged 2 euros day fee attendants rude hotel recommend hotel location price

Reviews.Title: “value for money!”
Reviews.Author: efou
Reviews.Content: boyfriend spent 5 nights hotel worth money payed location close metro station manzoni 7 minutes walk close termini train metro station 1520 minutes walk cute clean little bathroom clean adequate heating nice tv unfortunately balconies windows visited winter didnt matter breakfast satisfactory special fine cereals yogurt bread cheese ham honey marmalade coffee tea milk fruit vegetable bit noise busy street annoying double bed single beds recommend hotel value money location

Reviews.Title: “Very satisfied about Hotel Parker”
Reviews.Author: GabbeDutch
Reviews.Content: former reviews read rude staff hotel hotel parker anymore met friendly helpful staff 3night stay spacious clean bathroom towels changed day breakfast served basement daylight lot bread cheese meat jams yogurt cereals course coffee machines coffee getting easy leonardo express fiumicino airport termini station train roma station termini station walk 300 meter leave station via giovanni tram front station stop en walk 200 meter traveling town walked ca 230 meter piazza di porta maggiore lot buses trams destinations minor absence wifi guests hotel bedbreakfast service nowadays overall nice stay budget hotel

Reviews.Title: “bad location”
Reviews.Author: hadarami
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights hotel 2 floor noisy wallpaper thin walls noisy plumbing plus hear trains coming termini station location close termini station metro plus downsides noise dark enjoying walk aroung night time breakfast pastries bread cheese ham fruit 4th day juice machine dead staff failed provide drinks day hotel clean bottom line close 15 min walk colosseum advise choosing hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel, convenient for sightseeing”
Reviews.Author: Tony C
Reviews.Content: impressions met arrival unsmiling unfriendly unhelpful receptionist person duty evening stay enquired air conditioning unhelpful gentleman duty night friendly courteous resolved fortunately majority hotel staff helpful courteous english adequate ensuite bathroom serviced day towels changed day breakfast food available exit termini hotel opposite via giolitti 15 minutes walk tram line front hotel trams start running morning bit noisy youre light sleeper

Reviews.Title: “Not good, not bad - just ok.”
Reviews.Author: Kallaliina
Reviews.Content: arrived didnt smile hello cheap look luckily woman checkin friendly days rude woman attitude cleaned day hotel clean pay 2 euros night tourist tax told leaving brekfast wasnt amazing ok safety deposit box didnt fix taxi airport cost 60 euros five theres 10 minute walk termini station 15 minute walk colosseum five minute walk fantastic restaurant called il tempio di minerva

Reviews.Title: “Rude, Rude and Ruder.”
Reviews.Author: Unhappy029
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel parker nine hour journey greeted dour unsmiling offhand utter rudeness sour faced woman spoke manner breath informed uncertain terms clipped tones pay tax tourist 2 euros person day word tourist dirty word welcome woman parker hotel unusual girl prepared breakfast rude spoke described hatred voice met rude sour dark haired woman desk women utter disgrace remember ambassadors rome italy act decorum grace else leave occupation maids cleaned day courteous helpful pleasant unpleasant women remember wasnt tourists wouldnt job husband returning recommending hotel book spoken piece

Reviews.Title: “NO need for a travel alarm”
Reviews.Author: amiunluckey
Reviews.Content: hotel start 0630 morning late night local street tram passes front hotel stayed floor front directly tram chance sleep 15 min walk main train station reception 24 apart noise ok stay

Reviews.Title: “Realy bad hotel!”
Reviews.Author: IsabellaMartina
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel parker due mix hotel booked desk nice key clean airco wasnt sleep 5 minutes train passed time wasnt train passing 2330 hour 530 hour moring desk lady told bad luck hotels rome decided transfer nother hotel desicion holiday reservation hotel parker

Reviews.Title: “What a pleasant surprise”
Reviews.Author: KittensoftDublin
Reviews.Content: price expecting hotel nice sized air conditioning 1015 minute walk termini train station clean modern looking nice sized bathroom judge hotel outside city break downside staff bit friendly tip manzoni metro stop close walk feet sore

Reviews.Title: “Say no to Hotel Parker”
Reviews.Author: audio255106
Reviews.Content: friendly kiwis staff hotel parker rude intimidating hotel service provider whatever stay stayed 5 nights becuase pre paid accommodation mistake arrival 13 hour flight check told ready pre booked previous day available politely 2 surly women reception spoke english chose comment ignored 5 minutes finally handed hotel card underlined breakfast times check time day head breakfast reception women snarled stairs booked excursions confirm daily tour operator reception attitude draw straws choose confront reception please ring confirm booking time met sigh rude horrible stay unfortunatly prepaid started trip contact travel agent day learnt check hotel reviews recommeded hopefully adding reviews stayed hotel parker business
